column4: Hi, i'm running Ubuntu 8.04.2  shouldn't i be able to run the update manager and upgrade to 10.04 ?
update manager kicks off, but says it's up2date and the upgrade button is greyed out.  Could it be because i'm running ubuntu moblin edition on a dell mini?
ok, i'll look through docs and figure that out.  thx
does this look like a valid entry in the sources.list file?  deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/pub/ubuntu/ lucid main universe multiverse restricted
